The festivities eventually came to an end.%K%P
The local ladies took their drunken men back home,\nand peace and quiet returned to the main hall.%K%P
I was a tad tipsy from the social drinking, too.%K%P
The excitement from the festival hadn't quite worn\noff yet. Just then...%K%P
\dGood evening, Akira...\d%K%P
Yukari had somehow slipped into my room.%K%P
\dEvening, Yukari.\d%K%P
It was kind of awkward exchanging greetings again\nlike this, face-to-face.%K%P
\d...I just finished taking a bath.\d%K%P
\dI see. That's why you look so fresh.\d%K%P
\dHehehe! It's what the world calls 'freshly\nshowered!' It triples a woman's beauty.\d%K%P
Whether it was the alcohol or festivities, Yukari\ndid seem even more attractive than usual.%K%P
\dThe 'favor' you promised...\d%K%P
\dCould I...sleep beside you?\d%K%P
Yukari requested to sleep beside me as her prize\nfor winning at the polls.%K%P
I'd been so sure she would ask for something more\ndrastic, so this request threw me off a little.%K%P
\dAre you sure that's all you want?\d%K%P
\d...It's my dream to sleep beside you.\d%K%P
\dThat busybody kept interfering every time I\nslipped into your room before...\d%K%P
\dOh, that?\d%K%P
She must have been talking about how I would\nsometimes wake up in the morning to find her all\ntied up.%K%P
Kaede had fought Yukari off whenever she had tried\nto sneak into my room at night.%K%P
\dIt was so terrible! I was only trying to sleep\nbeside my beloved husband...\d%K%P
\dShe probably thought you had something else in\nmind.\d%K%P
\dWhat kind of monster does she think I am? Hmph!\d%K%P
Yukari pouted adorably.%K%P
Considering her history, though, it seemed that\nKaede's caution had been a reasonable response.%K%P
\dIt's late, and I'm sure you're tired, so...\d%K%P
\dYeah, wanna hit the sack?\d%K%P
\dJust lay down for now. I want to creep into your\nbed and snuggle a little.\d%K%P
\dYes, why not. Let's snuggle.\d%K%P
\dYay!\d%K%P
She made a small leap of joy.%K%P
What a cute little wife I had.%K%P
\dI'm turning off the lights.\d%K%P
The room dimmed immediately as the lights went off.%K%P
Still, it wasn't like we couldn't see each other,\nthere was enough moonlight filtering into the room.%K%P
\dAkira...\d%K%P
\dAll right, I'll lie down first.\d%K%P
\dNo, that's not it.\d%K%P
\dYou should take off your clothes before sleeping.\d%K%P
I gaped at Yukari's beaming face.%K%P
\dHuh? What's that supposed to mean?\d%K%P
\dDidn't you hear me? Take off your clothes! All of\nthem!\d%K%P
Seeing my hesitation, Yukari pounced on me and\nstarted taking my clothes off.%K%P
\dWait, wait! Stop pulling!\d%K%P
\dDon't worry! I'm just taking them off, is all.\d%K%P
\dListen to me!\d%K%P
\dIt's rude to sleep with clothes on! It's basic\ndivine etiquette to sleep in the nude.\d%K%P
\dI've never heard of that rule!\d%K%P
\dNo? Well, now you have!\d%K%P
Before I even realized it, I found myself left only\nin my underwear.%K%P
Her skills in such things were as impressive as\never.%K%P
\dAkira? You're still wearing something.\d%K%P
\dThese too?\d%K%P
\dYup!\d%K%P
\dFine... Just don't look...\d%K%P
I took off my underwear with my back turned.%K%P
\dAww, you've got such a cute butt, Akira!\d%K%P
\dI told you not to look!\d%K%P
\dCome on, don't be shy.\d%K%P
She wouldn't listen to a word I said.%K%P
I should probably stop making myself such an easy\ntarget.%K%P
\dNow it's my turn...\d%K%P
\dR-Right.\d%K%P
I heard the sound of rustling fabric behind me. %K%P
The sound of Yukari taking off her clothes.%K%P
*gulp*%K%P
I couldn't help but swallow hard.%K%P
A girl getting naked behind me was a situation that\ninduced much excitement.%K%P
\dHehehe, would you like to see?\d%K%P
\dI-I'm not gonna look!\d%K%P
\dYou won't, but you want to, right?\d%K%P
\dYes, but I won't.\d%K%P
\dYou could look as much as you like, though.\d%K%P
Yukari tried to bait me, but I refused to fall for\nit.%K%P
Carefully, without looking behind me, I lay down.%K%P
\dI've taken my clothes off too.\d%K%P
\dTime for us to snuggle!\d%K%P
\dD-Don't lay so close!\d%K%P
As soon as Yukari lay down, she clung to me.%K%P
\dBut I'll be so cold otherwise!\d%K%P
\dThen put on some clothes!\d%K%P
\dNooo way!\d%K%P
She quickly and firmly rejected the notion.%K%P
I guess this was what she'd been aiming for from\nthe start.%K%P
\dOh well... I'm supposed to be listening to all\nyour requests today, after all.\d%K%P
\dHehehe, what a sweet husband you are!\d%K%P
She embraced me tightly and happily.%K%P
With nothing between us, I could feel the sensation\nof her skin clearly against mine.%K%P
\dSo, how do I feel?\d%K%P
\d...Comfortable. And very soft.\d%K%P
\dAkira...you feel like a real man. You're a lot\nmore muscular than I thought...\d%K%P
Yukari, on the other hand, felt soft to the touch.%K%P
She was overflowing with feminine allure.%K%P
\dMy dream has finally come true.\d%K%P
\dWe've embraced a few times before, though.\d%K%P
\dTonight's special.\d%K%P
\dBecause...it's the night you've truly accepted me\nfor the first time...\d%K%P
This wasn't our first time making physical contact\nby any means.%K%P
But it was our first time since my recognizing\nYukari as my wife.%K%P
\dThen, let's make it even more special.\d%K%P
\dHuh?\d%K%P
\dCome closer. I want to hug you too.\d%K%P
\dA-Are you sure? I-I won't let you go back on it\nlater!\d%K%P
\dWhy would I say no? Come on.\d%K%P
I drew her closer to me, a little forcibly.%K%P
\dAh...\d%K%P
She blushed deeply from the unexpected movement.%K%P
\dNow you're feeling embarrassed?\d%K%P
\dI wasn't expecting this at all...!\d%K%P
\dYou're so sly... But I'm glad you are.\d%K%P
She slowly got used to the idea once her initial\nsurprise wore off.%K%P
Yukari wrapped her arms around me and we\nembraced each other.%K%P
\dOh... We're hugging each other completely\nnaked...\d%K%P
\dYeah, it's kind of embarrassing.\d%K%P
\dHehehe, your face is all red.\d%K%P
\dCan you blame me?\d%K%P
\dNo. It's the same for me.\d%K%P
We smiled in each other's embrace.%K%P
I was still nervous, but slowly started to regain\nmy composure.%K%P
\dSo, snuggling successful?\d%K%P
\dY-Yes...\d%K%P
\dAnything else you want to do?\d%K%P
\dUmm... How about...\d%K%P
\dA-A kiss, or something?\d%K%P
She asked for a kiss very bashfully.%K%P
\dSure, let's kiss.\d%K%P
\dOkay!\d%K%P
Nodding happily, she closed her eyes while\npuckering her lips.%K%P
Her slightly moist lips were eagerly waiting for\nmine. %K%P
\dYukari...\d%K%P
\dMmm...\d%K%P
Our lips touched.%K%P
A brief touch, but I could feel Yukari's feelings\nrushing into me all at once.%K%P
\dHmm...\d *smooch*%K%P
As if unwilling to let go of that burst of bliss,\nYukari pressed closer.%K%P
Our touching intensified, and our breathing\noverlapped.%K%P
*smooch, smooch* \d...Oh, Akira...\d %K%P
*smooch* \d...I love you...\d *smooch* \dLove you...\d%K%P
Mere touches were not enough now, and we kissed\nloudly, again and again.%K%P
In between our kisses, she kept declaring her love\nfor me, and that made me feel something.%K%P
\dI love you too, Yukari...\d%K%P
\dFwah?\d%K%P
\dWhy are you so surprised?\d%K%P
\dI...\d%K%P
\dI guess I'm to blame for that, huh? Sorry, I'll do\nbetter.\d%K%P
Yukari, Shion, and Kaede had all proclaimed their\ndevotion for me.%K%P
Yet I didn't respond to any of them. All this time\nI hadn't made my feelings clear.%K%P
\dDon't worry. I've announced to the world that I'm\nmarrying you already, right?\d%K%P
\dSo relax and let me love you.\d%K%P
\dAkira...\d%K%P
\dIt's kind of embarrassing. But I really should've\nsaid it sooner.\d%K%P
\dNo, it's fine. It's never too late.\d%K%P
\dThank you, Akira. I'm so happy, from the bottom of\nmy heart...\d%K%P
Yukari started tearing up in my arms.%K%P
\d...Let's kiss again.\d%K%P
\dMmm...\d%K%P
Our lips touched again.%K%P
The fact that we were embracing each other in the\nnude no longer seemed embarrassing.%K%P
\dHehehe, we really kissed a lot...\d%K%P
\dAre you happy?\d%K%P
\dVery!\d%K%P
\dAnd I'm going to be this happy every day from now\non, right?\d%K%P
\dThat's right. You don't have to always be so\nfrustrated anymore.\d%K%P
\dYeah...\d%K%P
\dShall we call it a night, then?\d%K%P
\dYes, let's do that. I'm getting sleepy too.\d%K%P
A yawn escaped my lips.%K%P
I wasn't used to drinking alcohol, and I was\nsuddenly really sleepy.%K%P
\dHehe, let's sleep snuggled up against each other\nlike this...\d%K%P
\dGood night, Yukari...\d%K%P
My initial bout of excitement slowly faded away,\nand my heart calmed.%K%P
I fell asleep the moment I closed my eyes.%K%P
Surrounded by Yukari's warmth and sweet-smelling\nscent.%K%P
\dGood night, Akira...\d%K%P
